response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, offering unparalleled value and quality. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1,200,000. My offer to you is to acquire this product for $1,150,000. I believe this price reflects the product's worth while also providing you with an attractive opportunity. Please consider this offer carefully, and let me know if you have any questions or need further information. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1150000}
